mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.nome, c.cfu, c.ore, s.id as s_id, s.nome as s_nome, s.cognome as s_cognome, s.email as s_email, s.matricola as s_matricola FROM corsi c LEFT JOIN corsi_studenti_iscrizioni csi on c.id = csi.corsoid LEFT JOIN studenti s on s.id = csi.studenteid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO corsi (nome, cfu, ore) VALUES (#{nome}, #{cfu}, #{ore})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM corsi_studenti_iscrizioni WHERE corsoid = #{corsoId} AND studenteid = #{studenteId}
